entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 24 except 17 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 24 except 17 near Lake Ontario. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
